item.title: Found: Advanced Tor Browser Bundle config
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Usually recommended against by Tor developers as far I know, because then you stand out from most Tor users. The answer is most times something like this “If you have read most of http://freehaven.net/anonbib/ and if you are more clever than the Tor developers, by all means, go ahead and modify the routing algorithm.”

Read full topic
item.source: Found: Advanced Tor Browser Bundle config
